AffiliateAddress.name: AffiliateAddress
rows: The line 1 address of a location associated with an entity
The line 2 address of a location associated with an entity
The City associated with an entity
The Zip Code associated with an entity

select distinct
[AffiliateAddressId]=c.id,
[AffiliateId]=p.id,
[AddressLine1]=ad.address_line_1,
[AddressLine2]=ad.address_line_2,
[City]=ad.city,
[CountyId]=ad.county_id,
[StateTerritoryId]=ad.state_territory_id,
[CountryId]=ad.country_id,
[PostalCode]=ad.zip_code,
[CarrierRoute]=ad.carrier_route,
[Latitude]=ad.latitude,
[Longitude]=ad.latitude,
[AffiliateAddressTypeId]=case
when c.contact_context_id in (19,20) then c.contact_context_id
else 19 end,
[ContactStatusId]=isnull(c.contact_status_id,2),
[IsPreferred]=isnull(c.is_preferred,0),
[ContactSourceId]=c.contact_source_id,
[VerifiedDate]=c.verified_date,
[CanVisitRestrictionId]=IIF(ad.can_visit = 0, 2, 1),
[CanSendMailRestrictionId]=null,
[PreventNcoaUpdate]=ad.is_prevent_ncoa_update,
[CreatedAt] = c.created_at,
[UpdatedAt] = c.updated_at
FROM address ad (nolock)
inner join contact c with (NoLock)  on ad.contact_id=c.id
inner join party p  with (NoLock)  on p.id=c.party_id
inner join affiliate af  with (NoLock) on p.id=af.party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw  with (NoLock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
where c.is_deleted=0
and c.contact_type_id=4
and p.party_type_id=2
and p.is_deleted=0
and af.affiliate_type_id<>19

AffiliateAddressType.name: AffiliateAddressType
rows:
SELECT distinct
 [AffiliateAddressTypeId]=c.id,
[AffiliateAddressTypeName]  =c.name

  inner Join contact_context c (nolock) on cc.contact_context_id = c.id
  Where 1=1
  and contact_type_id = 4
 and c.is_deleted=0
 and cc.is_deleted=0
 and c.party_type_id=2

AffiliateBillHighwayForm.name: AffiliateBillHighwayForm
rows:
Select Distinct
[AffiliateBillHighwayFormId] = bdc.BillTypeDuescategoryMappingID,
[AffiliateId] = p.id,
[AffiliateNumber] = bdc.LocalUnionNbr,
[AffiliateName] = vafc.AffiliateName,
[BillHighwayGroupId] = bdc.GroupID,
[BillingTypeName] = bdc.BillingTypeName,
[BillingTypeId] = bdc.BillingTypeId,
[PaymentType] = bdc.PaymentType,
[DuesAmount] = bdc.DuesAmount,
[PaymentFrequency] = bdc.LocalFrequency,
[LocalDescription] = bdc.LocalDescription,
[NationalDuesCategoryId] = mc.id,
[NationalPerCapita] = mc.name,
[StateDuesCategoryId] = null,
[StatePerCapita] = ISNULL(sd.StateDuesCategoryName, bdc.StateDuesCategoryName),
[AcceptedCreditCard] = Null,
[AccountType] = Null,
[AllowWorksiteLocation] = Null,
[BillHighwayMember] = Null,
[BypassDMARC] = Null,
[CategoryId] = Null,
[CCEmail] = Null,
[CopeLanguage] = Null,
[CopeLanguageDescription] = Null,
[CollectionId] = Null,
[CollectionType] = Null,
[FormId] = Null,
[FrequencyDescription] = Null,
[LegalLanguage] = Null,
[LegalLanguageDescription] = Null,
[Percentage] = Null,
[PoliticalCollectionName] = Null,
[PreferredCollection] = Null,
[AFTLogo] = Null,
[ShowAmount] = Null,
[ShowFullSSNInPDF] = Null,
[SSN] = Null,
[SendSubmissionEmails] = Null,
[SubmissionMailDescription] = Null,
[SubmissionPage] = Null,
[SubmissionTitle] = Null,
[SubmissionDate]  = Null,
[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(bdc.cdate, bdc.mdate),
[UpdatedAt] = ISNULL(bdc.mdate, bdc.cdate)
From [BillTypeDuescategoryMapping] bdc (nolock)
inner Join vw_1_affiliate_connect vafc (nolock) on bdc.LocalUnionNbr = vafc.AffiliateNbr
inner join party p	(nolock) on vafc.AffiliateId = p.guid
Left Join membership_category mc	(nolock) on bdc.DuesCategoryId = mc.guid and mc.party_id is NULL and mc.is_deleted = 0
Left Join (select distinct
[StateDuesCategoryId] = mc.id,
[StateDuesCategoryName] = mc.name,
[NationalDuesCategoryId] = mc.national_membership_category_id,
[AffiliateId] = p.Id,
[PaymentFrequencyId] = pf.payment_frequency_id,
a.number,
mc.guid,
ROW_NUMBER() Over (Partition by mc.guid Order by mc.guid) r
from membership_category mc (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on mc.party_id = p.id
inner join affiliate a (nolock) on p.id = a.party_id
inner join affiliate_type at (nolock) on a.affiliate_type_id = at.id
Left join membership_category_payment_frequency pf (nolock) on mc.id = pf.membership_category_id and pf.is_deleted=0
where at.affiliate_level_id = 2
and mc.is_deleted = 0
and p.is_deleted=0
and at.is_deleted=0) sd on sd.guid = bdc.StateDuesCategoryId and r = 1

AffiliateCommittee.name: AffiliateCommittee
rows:
SELECT distinct
AffiliateCommitteeId=c.id,
AffiliateCommitteeName=c.name,
AffiliateId=p2.id,
CommitteeTypeId=c.committee_type_id,
Description=c.description,
[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(c.created_at, c.updated_at),
[UpdatedAt] = ISNULL(c.updated_at, c.created_at)
FROM committee c (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on c.party_id=p.id
inner join affiliate af (nolock) on af.party_id=p.id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.guid=vw.affiliateid
inner join affiliate_type at (nolock) on af.affiliate_type_id=at.id
where c.is_deleted=0
and p.is_deleted=0
and at.id<>19

AffiliateCommitteeMember.name: AffiliateCommitteeMember
rows:
SELECT   distinct
AffiliateCommitteeMemberId=ifrc.id,
AffiliateCommitteeId=ifrc.committee_id,
IndividualId = i.IndividualId,
CommitteeMemberTypeId=ifrc.committee_membership_type_id,
StartDate=r.start_date,
EndDate=r.stop_date,
CreatedAt = ifrc.created_at,
UpdatedAt = ifrc.updated_at
FROM  individual_affiliate_relationship_committee ifrc (nolock)
inner JOIN relationship r (nolock) ON r.id = ifrc.relationship_id
inner join party p (nolock) on r.party_id = p.id
inner join vw_1_individual i (nolock) on p.id = i.IndividualId
inner join Affiliate a (nolock)	on a.party_id = r.related_party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate af (nolock) on a.number = af.AffiliateNumber
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.AffiliateNumber
inner join committee c (nolock) on c.id=ifrc.committee_id
inner join vw_1_affiliatecommittee vwac on ifrc.committee_id = vwac.affiliatecommitteeid
where r.is_deleted=0
and p.is_deleted = 0
and c.is_deleted=0
and ifrc.is_deleted=0
and (ifrc.stop_date is null or ifrc.stop_date>=getdate())

Affiliate.name: Affiliate
rows: join with party and afifliate tabel find the affiliate number for the parent party id
which state this affiliate is chartered

select distinct
[AffiliateId] =p.id,
[AffiliateGuid] =p.guid,
[AffiliateName] =af.name,
[AffiliateNumber]=case when af.number='06732' and af.designation='6732R' then '6732R' else af.number end,
[AffiliateAbbreviatedName] =af.abbreviated_name,
[AffiliateAcronym] =af.acronym,
[AffiliateEIN] =af.employer_identification_number,
[AffiliatePerCapitaPIN] =af.per_capita_pin,
[BillHighwayGroupId]=af.billhighway_group_id,
[IsChartered]=af.is_chartered,
[CharterDate] =CONVERT(DATETIME2(0), af.charter_date),
[ParentAffiliateId] =case when p.parent_party_id in (4090, 4091, 4092, 4093, 4094,4095) then 3585 else p.parent_party_id end,
[AffiliateTypeId] =case
when at.code in ('N','R','RW') then (select affiliatetypeid from vw_1_affiliatetype where affiliatetypename='National')
when at.code in ('S','SV','SM','SR') then (select affiliatetypeid from vw_1_affiliatetype where affiliatetypename='State Federation')
when at.code in ('LF') or af.number in (Select number from vw_federated_local) then (select affiliatetypeid from vw_1_affiliatetype where affiliatetypename='Federated Local')
when at.code in ('C') then (select affiliatetypeid from vw_1_affiliatetype where affiliatetypename='Council')
else (select affiliatetypeid from vw_1_affiliatetype where affiliatetypename='Local')
end,
[AffiliateDesignationId] =case
when at.code in ('LA') then (select affiliatedesignationid from vw_1_affiliatedesignation where affiliatedesignationname='Associate')
when at.code in ('LP') then (select affiliatedesignationid from vw_1_affiliatedesignation where affiliatedesignationname='Provisional')
when at.code in ('E','LE') then (select affiliatedesignationid from vw_1_affiliatedesignation where affiliatedesignationname='Reserved')
when at.code in ('LR','SR') then (select affiliatedesignationid from vw_1_affiliatedesignation where affiliatedesignationname='Retiree')
else (select affiliatedesignationid from vw_1_affiliatedesignation where affiliatedesignationname='Typical')
end,
[AffiliateGeoReachId] =case
when at.code in ('N','R','LW') then (select affiliategeoreachid from vw_1_affiliategeoreach where affiliategeoreachname='National')
when at.code in ('S','SV','SM','SR','LS') then (select affiliategeoreachid from vw_1_affiliategeoreach where affiliategeoreachname='Statewide Local')
else (select affiliategeoreachid from vw_1_affiliategeoreach where affiliategeoreachname='Local')
end,
[IsAffiliateActive] =case when af.affiliate_status_id=1 then 1 else 0 end,
[AffiliateInactiveReasonId] =null,
[AffiliateInactiveDate] =CONVERT(DATETIME2(0), af.disaffiliation_date),
[LocationStateAbr] =left(af.local_geographical_state_abbreviation,2),
[RegionId]=st.region_party_id,
[RetireeEntityTypeId]=(select EntityTypeId from vw_1_entitytype where EntityTypeName='Unit'),
[RetireeDestinationId]=null,
[ElectionMonth] = ae.election_held_month,
[OfficerTermStartMonth] = ae.officer_term_start_month,
[IsElectionYearOdd] = ae.is_election_held_odd_or_even_year,
[ElectionTermYears] = ae.election_term_length,
[NoNcoaUpdate]=isnull(af.is_prevent_ncoa_update,0),
[NoNationalUpdate]=isnull(af.is_prevent_national_update,0),
[NoStateUpdate]=isnull(af.is_prevent_state_update,0),
[NoLanWanUpdate]=isnull(af.is_prevent_lan_wan_update,0),
[NoExternalUpdate]=isnull(af.is_prevent_third_party_update,0),
[AffiliateWebsite]=af.website_url,
IsActionNetwork=0,
[UsesAftMemberId] = af.[is_member_id_generated_by_aft],
[CreatedAt] = p.created_at,
[UpdatedAt] = isnull(p.updated_at, p.created_at)
from affiliate af (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on af.party_id=p.id
inner join affiliate_type at (nolock) on af.affiliate_type_id=at.id
left outer join (select * from affiliate_retiree_business_rule_relationship (nolock) where retiree_business_rule_id=1) ret1 on ret1.affiliate_party_id = af.party_id
left outer join (select distinct a.* from  affiliate_retiree_business_rule_relationship a (nolock) inner join party p (nolock) on a.options=p.id where p.is_deleted=0) ret2 on ret2.affiliate_party_id = af.party_id
left outer join (select * from  affiliate_retiree_business_rule_relationship (nolock) where retiree_business_rule_id=4) ret3 on ret3.affiliate_party_id = af.party_id
left outer join affiliate_election ae (nolock) on ae.id = af.party_id
left join state_territory st (nolock) on st.code=left(af.local_geographical_state_abbreviation,2)
where 1=1
and af.affiliate_type_id not in (18,19,20)
and p.is_deleted=0
and p.party_type_id=2
and af.name not like '%test%'
and af.number not like 'cp%'
and af.number not in ('99799','99997')
and (len(af.number) =5)
and af.number not like 'reg%'
and af.number<>'stfed'
and (p.guid in (select affiliateid from vw_1_affiliate_connect) or af.affiliate_type_id in (1, 4,6, 25, 26) or af.number in ('99999','99998', '09005') )

AffiliateDesignation.name: AffiliateDesignation
rows: if name=local, rename to Typical, for other names, remove " local" at the end

select distinct
AffiliateDesignationId=id,
AffiliateDesignationName=case
when name='Local' then 'Typical'
when name='T/A Local' then 'Temporary'
else replace(name,' Local','')
end,
CreatedAt = created_at,
UpdatedAt = isnull(updated_at, created_at)
from affiliate_type (nolock)
where is_deleted=0
and affiliate_level_id =3
and code not in ('sv','m','GW','RW','LF','LS','LW','V','LM','LO','LN')

AffiliateDivision.name: AffiliateDivision
rows:
Select distinct
AffiliateDivisionId=ad.id,
AffiliateId=a.party_id,
DivisionId=d.id,
CreatedAt = ad.created_at,
UpdatedAt = isnull(ad.updated_at, ad.created_at)
from [affiliate_division] ad (nolock)
inner join affiliate a (nolock) on ad.party_id = a.party_id
inner join party p (nolock) on p.id=a.party_id
inner join division d (nolock) on ad.division_id = d.id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on p.guid=vw.affiliateid
where 1=1
and ad.party_id is not null
and ad.division_id is not null
and ad.is_deleted=0

AffiliateEmail.name: AffiliateEmail
rows: An email address associated with an entity

SELECT DISTINCT
  [AffiliateEmailId] = c.id,
  [AffiliateId] = p.id,
  Email = e.email_address,
  [AffiliateEmailTypeId] =
                          CASE
                            WHEN c.contact_context_id NOT IN (19, 20) THEN 19
                            ELSE c.contact_context_id
                          END,
  [ContactStatusId] = c.contact_status_id,
  [IsPreferred] = c.is_preferred,
  [ContactSourceId] = c.contact_source_id,
  [VerifiedDate] = c.verified_date,
  [CanContactRestrictionId] = IIF(ISNULL(c.can_contact, 1) = 0, 2, 1),
  [CreatedAt] = c.created_at,
 [UpdatedAt] = c.updated_at
FROM email e (nolock)
INNER JOIN contact c (NOLOCK)
  ON e.contact_id = c.id
INNER JOIN party p (NOLOCK)
  ON p.id = c.party_id
INNER JOIN affiliate af (NOLOCK)
  ON p.id = af.party_id
INNER JOIN vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (NOLOCK)
  ON vw.affiliatenbr = af.number
WHERE c.is_deleted = 0
AND c.contact_type_id = 2
AND p.party_type_id = 2
AND p.is_deleted = 0
AND af.affiliate_type_id <> 19

AffiliateEmailType.name: AffiliateEmailType
rows:
SELECT distinct
[AffiliateEmailTypeId]=c.id,
[AffiliateEmailTypeName]  =c.name
FROM [contact_type_contact_context] cc (nolock)
inner Join contact_context c (nolock) on cc.contact_context_id = c.id
Where 1=1
and contact_type_id = 2
and c.is_deleted=0
and cc.is_deleted=0
and c.party_type_id=2

AffiliateGeoReach.name: AffiliateGeoReach
rows:
select distinct AffiliateGeoReachId=id,
AffiliateGeoReachName=name,
CreatedAt = created_at,
UpdatedAt = isnull(updated_at, created_at) 
from affiliate_type (nolock) 
where code in ('L','N','LS')

AffiliateGroup.name: AffiliateGroup
rows:
Select [AffiliateGroupId] = ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by AffiliateId, [AffiliateGroupTypeId]),
[AffiliateGroupName] = [AffiliateGroupName],
[AffiliateId] = [AffiliateId],
[AffiliateGroupTypeId] = [AffiliateGroupTypeId],
[Description] = NULL 
From (
Select Distinct [AffiliateGroupName] = iart.name,
[AffiliateId] = vaf.AffiliateId,
[AffiliateGroupTypeId] = iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id,
[Description] = NULL
From Relationship r
Join individual_affiliate_relationship iar	on r.id = iar.relationship_id
Join Individual_Affiliate_Relationship_Type iart	on iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id = iart.Id
Join vw_1_Individual i	on r.party_id = i.IndividualId
join affiliate af (nolock) on af.party_id=r.related_party_id
join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
join vw_1_Affiliate vaf (nolock)	on vaf.AffiliateNumber = vw.affiliatenbr
Where r.is_deleted = 0
and iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id in (3,14,18,22,29,33)
) a

AffiliateGroupMember.name: AffiliateGroupMember
rows: An Identification associated with an individual

Select distinct 
[AffiliateGroupMemberId],
[AffiliateGroupId],
[IndividualId],
[StartDate],
[EndDate],
[UpdatedAt],
[CreatedAt]
From (
Select [AffiliateGroupMemberId] = r.id,
[AffiliateGroupId] = ag.AffiliateGroupId,
[IndividualId] = i.IndividualId,
[AffiliateId] = vaf.AffiliateId,
r.Related_party_id,
[AffiliateGroupTypeId] = iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id,
[StartDate] = r.start_date,
[EndDate] = r.stop_date,
[UpdatedAt] = r.updated_at,
[CreatedAt] = r.created_at,
ROW_NUMBER() Over (Partition by i.IndividualId, ag.AffiliateGroupId Order by ISNULL(r.stop_date, '2999-12-31') Desc, r.Start_date desc) rn
From Relationship r
Join individual_affiliate_relationship iar	on r.id = iar.relationship_id
Join vw_1_Individual i	on r.party_id = i.IndividualId
join affiliate af (nolock) on af.party_id=r.related_party_id
join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
join vw_1_Affiliate vaf (nolock)	on vaf.AffiliateNumber = vw.affiliatenbr
Join Vw_1_AffiliateGroup ag (nolock)	on ag.AffiliateId = vaf.AffiliateId and ag.AffiliateGroupTypeId = iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id
Where r.is_deleted = 0
and iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id in (3,14,18,22,29,33)
) a
Where a.rn = 1

AffiliateInactiveReason_data.name: AffiliateInactiveReason_data
rows: Employer Related Employer Out of Business

AffiliateNotes.name: AffiliateNotes
rows:
Select distinct
AffiliateNotesId=c.id,
AffiliateId=p.id,
AffiliateNotes = c.comment,
AffiliateNotesDate = c.created_at,
AffiliateNotesAuthor = 'AFT',
 [CreatedAt] = c.created_at,
 [UpdatedAt] = isnull(c.updated_at, c.created_at)
from party_comment c (nolock)
inner join affiliate af (nolock) on c.party_id = af.party_id
inner join party p (nolock) on p.id=c.party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect a (nolock) on p.guid=a.affiliateid
where 1=1
and c.comment<>''
and c.party_id is not null
and c.comment not like '%Test%'
and c.is_deleted=0

AffiliateOfficer.name: AffiliateOfficer
rows:
SELECT  distinct
[AffiliateOfficerId]=iar.relationship_id,
AffiliateOfficerRoleId = iar.leadership_position_id ,
IndividualId = i.party_id,
AffiliateId = af.AffiliateId,
TermStartDate = r.start_date ,
TermEdDate = r.stop_date ,
IsElected = iif(iar.leadership_achievement_method_id=1, 1, 0) ,
IsCurrent = iif(iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_status_id=1, 1, 0),
IsPreferredTitle=iar.is_leadership_preferred_title,
CreatedAt = r.created_at,
UpdatedAt = r.updated_at
FROM  individual_affiliate_relationship iar (nolock)
inner      JOIN relationship r   (nolock)   ON r.id = iar.relationship_id
Join party p (nolock) on r.party_id = p.id
Join individual i (nolock) on p.id = i.party_id
inner join [vw_1_Individual] iv (nolock) on iv.IndividualId=i.party_id
inner JOIN individual_affiliate_relationship_type iart (nolock)   ON iart.id = iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id
inner JOIN leadership_position lp (nolock) ON lp.id = iar.leadership_position_id
inner join Affiliate a (nolock)	on a.party_id = r.related_party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate af (nolock) on a.number = af.AffiliateNumber
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=a.number
WHERE 1=1
and lp.party_id IS NOT NULL
AND iar.leadership_position_id IS NOT NULL
AND iart.name = 'Officer'
and r.is_deleted=0
and lp.is_deleted=0
  and iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_status_id=1
and r.relationship_type_id=1
and p.is_deleted = 0

AffiliateOfficerRole.name: AffiliateOfficerRole
rows:
SELECT distinct
[AffiliateOfficerRoleId]=lp.id,
[AffiliateOfficerRoleName]=concat(af.name, ' - ', lp.name),
[AffiliateId]=p2.id,
[OfficerRoleTitleId]= national_leadership_position_id,
CreatedAt = lp.created_at,
UpdatedAt = ISNULL(lp.updated_at, lp.created_at)
  FROM  leadership_position lp (nolock)
  inner join party p (nolock) on lp.party_id=p.id
  inner join affiliate af (nolock) on p.id=af.party_id
  inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
  inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.guid=vw.affiliateid
 WHERE  lp.party_id IS NOT NULL
 and p.is_deleted=0
 and lp.is_deleted=0
 and lp.national_leadership_position_id IN (326, 327, 340, 328, 329, 330, 341, 331, 332, 333, 334, 342, 335, 343, 2570,  337,338,892,2571,336,2572)

AffiliatePerCapita.name: AffiliatePerCapita
rows:
select distinct
[AffiliatePerCapitaId]=af.party_id,
 [AffiliateId] = af.party_id,
 [AffiliateNbr] = af.number,
 [FiscalYearEndMonth] = af.[fiscal_year_end_month],
 [FiscalYearEndDay] = af.[fiscal_year_end_day],
 [PayPerCapitaToAFT] = 1,
 [InvoicedByAFT] =1,
 [IncludeStatePerCapita] = case
       when left(af.local_geographical_state_abbreviation,2) in ('CA','CT','IO','MA','NJ','NC','OH','TN','WI') then 1
       else 0         end,
 [IncludeAFLCIOPerCapita]= 1,
 [AFLCIOAmount] = 0.00,
 [AffiliateBillingFrequencyId] = 1,
 [HasOccupationalLiabilityInsurance] =af.[is_occupational_liability_insurance_offered],
 [AccidentInsuranceUnits] =isnull(af.[members_accident_insurance_units],1),
 [HasCope] =case when c.party_id is not null then 1 else 0 end,
 [IsCopeVoluntary]=case when c.party_id is not null then 1 else 0 end,
 [HasPIPE]=0,
 [IsDirectBargaining] =isnull([is_bargaining_unit] ,1),
 [ConventionDelegationEligibility] =        isnull([is_eligible_for_delegates],0),
 [HasStateWebAccess] =0,
 [CurrentFiduciaryBondCoverageID] =null,
 [RequestedFiduciaryBondCoverageID] =null,
 [CreatedAt] = p.created_at,
 [UpdatedAt] = isnull(p.updated_at, p.created_at)
from Affiliate af (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on af.party_id=p.id
inner join vw_1_affiliate vw (nolock) on vw.affiliateguid=p.guid
left join vw_affiliate_cope c (nolock) on c.party_id=af.party_id
where 1=1
and p.is_deleted=0
and p.party_type_id=2
and af.affiliate_type_id<>19

AffiliatePhone.name: AffiliatePhone
rows: phonenumber is how we track the contact phone number of any entity
The phone number asscoiated with the the PhoneId

SELECT DISTINCT
  AffiliatePhoneId = c.id,
  AffiliateId = af.party_id,
  PhoneNumber = p.phone_number,
  Extension = p.extension,
  AffiliatePhoneTypeId =
                        CASE
                          WHEN c.contact_context_id NOT IN (19, 20, 21) THEN 19
                          ELSE c.contact_context_id
                        END,
  ContactStatusId = c.contact_status_id,
  CanTextRestrictionId = IIF(isnull(p.is_sms_allowed,1) = 0, 2, 1),
  CanCallRestrictionId = IIF(isnull(p.is_sms_allowed,1) = 0, 2, 1),
  IsPreferred = c.Is_Preferred,
  ContactSourceId = c.contact_source_id,
  VerifiedDate = c.verified_date,
  CreatedAt = c.created_at,
 UpdatedAt = c.updated_at
FROM Phone p (nolock)
JOIN Contact c (NOLOCK)
  ON p.contact_id = c.id
JOIN party pa (NOLOCK)
  ON c.party_id = pa.id
JOIN Affiliate af (NOLOCK)
  ON pa.id = af.party_id
JOIN vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (NOLOCK)
  ON vw.affiliatenbr = af.number
WHERE c.is_deleted = 0
AND pa.is_deleted = 0
AND pa.party_type_id = 2
AND af.affiliate_type_id <> 19

AffiliateSocialMedia.name: AffiliateSocialMedia
rows:

                        AffiliateId = af2.AffiliateId,

AffiliateStaff.name: AffiliateStaff
rows:
Select [AffiliateStaffId] = ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by a.[IndividualId],a.[AffiliateId]),
[IndividualId] = a.[IndividualId],
[AffiliateId] = a.[AffiliateId],
[StaffDepartmentId] = a.[StaffDepartmentId],
[StaffTitle] = a.[StaffTitle],
[TermStartDate] = a.[TermStartDate],
[TermEndDate] = a.[TermEndDate],
[IsCurrent] = a.[IsCurrent],
[UpdatedAt] = a.updated_at,
[CreatedAt] = a.created_at

From
(
SELECT distinct
--[AffiliateStaffId]=ier.relationship_id,
[IndividualId]=r.Party_id,
[AffiliateId]=vaf.AffiliateId,
[StaffDepartmentId]=ISNULL(sd.staffdepartmentId, 11),
[StaffTitle]=ier.job_title,
[TermStartDate]=Convert(Date, r.start_date),
[TermEndDate]=Convert(Date,r.stop_date),
[IsCurrent]=iif(iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_status_id=1, 1, 0)
,r.updated_at
,r.created_at
FROM  individual_affiliate_relationship iar (nolock)
inner JOIN relationship r (nolock) ON r.id = iar.relationship_id
inner join party p (nolock) on r.party_id = p.id
inner join vw_1_Individual vi (nolock)	on vi.IndividualId = p.id
inner join affiliate af (nolock) on af.party_id=r.related_party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join vw_1_Affiliate vaf (nolock)	on vaf.AffiliateNumber = vw.affiliatenbr
inner join  individual_affiliate_relationship_type iart (nolock) on iart.id=iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id
inner join relationship r2 (nolock) on r2.party_id =r.party_id
inner join employer e (nolock) on r2.related_party_id=e.party_id
inner join individual_employer_relationship ier (nolock) on ier.relationship_id=r2.id
Left join staffdepartment sd (nolock) on sd.[StaffDepartmentName]=ier.work_department
where iart.name like '%staff%'
and r2.relationship_type_id=2
and r.relationship_type_id=1
and r.is_deleted=0
and r2.is_deleted=0
and e.employer_type_id=8
and p.is_deleted = 0
and iart.is_deleted = 0
and ier.job_title is not null
and af.affiliate_type_id != 19
 ) a

Chapter.name: Chapter
rows:
Select distinct
[ChapterId]=p.id,
[ChapterGuid] = p.guid,
[ChapterNumber] = CONCAT(af2.number, '-', af.chapter_number),
[ChapterName] = af.name,
[AffiliateId] = p.parent_party_id,
[IsChapterActive] = case when af.affiliate_status_id=1 then 1 else 0 end,
[ChapterEIN] = af.employer_identification_number,
[IsChartered] = af.is_chartered,
[CharterDate] = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0), af.charter_date),
[ElectionMonth] = ae.election_held_month,
[OfficerTermStartMonth] = ae.officer_term_start_month,
[IsElectionYearOdd] = ae.is_election_held_odd_or_even_year,
[ElectionTermYears] = ae.election_term_length,
[IsStructural] = 0,
[IsUnknown] = 0
from affiliate af (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on af.party_id = p.id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.guid=vw.affiliateid
inner join affiliate af2 (nolock) on af2.party_id=p2.id
left outer join affiliate_election ae (nolock) on ae.id = af.party_id
where p.is_deleted=0
and af.number<>''
and af.affiliate_type_id=19
and af2.number in (Select number From vw_federated_local)
and p2.is_deleted=0
and (af.name not like '% Ret' and af.name not like '%Reti%' and af.Name not like 'RET %' and af.Name not like 'RET')

Union

select vwa.affiliateId
		,[ChapterGuid] = NEWID()
		,[ChapterNumber] = CONCAT(vwa.AffiliateNumber, '-', '0000')
		,[ChapterName] = CONCAT(vwa.AffiliateName, ' - Structured Chapter')
		,[AffiliateId] = vwa.AffiliateId
		,[IsChapterActive] = 0
		,[ChapterEIN] = NULL
,[IsChartered] = NULL
,[CharterDate] = NULL
,[ElectionMonth] = NULL
,[OfficerTermStartMonth] = NULL
,[IsElectionYearOdd] = NULL
,[ElectionTermYears] = NULL
		,[IsStructural] = 1
		,[IsUnknown] = 0
From vw_1_Affiliate  vwa

union

select 100000 + vwa.affiliateId
		,[ChapterGuid] = NEWID()
		,[ChapterNumber] = CONCAT(vwa.AffiliateNumber, '-', '1000')
		,[ChapterName] = CONCAT(vwa.AffiliateName, ' - Unknown Chapter')
		,[AffiliateId] = vwa.AffiliateId
		,[IsChapterActive] = 0
			,[ChapterEIN] = NULL
,[IsChartered] = NULL
,[CharterDate] = NULL
,[ElectionMonth] = NULL
,[OfficerTermStartMonth] = NULL
,[IsElectionYearOdd] = NULL
,[ElectionTermYears] = NULL
		,[IsStructural] = 0
		,[IsUnknown] = 1
From vw_1_Affiliate  vwa
Where AffiliateNumber in (Select number From vw_federated_local)

EmployerAddress.name: EmployerAddress
rows: The line 1 address of a location associated with an entity
The line 2 address of a location associated with an entity
The City associated with an entity
The Zip Code associated with an entity

select distinct
[EmployerAddressId]=c.id,
[EmployerId]=p.id,
[AddressLine1]=ad.address_line_1,
[AddressLine2]=ad.address_line_2,
[City]=ad.city,
[CountyId]=ad.county_id,
[StateTerritoryId]=ad.state_territory_id,
[CountryId]=ad.country_id,
[PostalCode]=ad.zip_code,
[CarrierRoute]=ad.[carrier_route],
[Latitude]=ad.latitude,
[Longitude]=ad.longitude,
[EmployerAddressTypeId]=case when c.contact_context_id in (22,23) then c.contact_context_id else 22 end,
[ContactStatusId]=isnull(c.contact_status_id,2),
[IsPreferred]=isnull(c.is_preferred,0),
[ContactSourceId]=c.contact_source_id,
[VerifiedDate]=c.verified_date,
[CanVisitRestrictionId]=IIF(ad.can_visit = 0, 2, 1),
[CanSendMailRestrictionId]=2,
[PreventNcoaUpdate]=ad.is_prevent_ncoa_update,
[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(c.created_at, c.updated_at),
[UpdatedAt] = isnull(c.updated_at, c.created_at)
FROM address ad (nolock)
inner join contact c (nolock) on ad.contact_id=c.id
inner join party p (nolock) on p.id=c.party_id
inner join employer e (nolock) on e.party_id=p.id
inner join relationship r (nolock) on r.related_party_id=e.party_id
inner join affiliate af (nolock) on r.party_id=af.party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.id=af.party_id
inner join vw_1_Employer ve (nolock) on ve.employerid=p.id
left join  employer_location_contact elc (nolock) on elc.contact_id=c.id
where 1=1
and c.is_deleted=0
and c.contact_type_id=4
and p.party_type_id=3
and p.is_deleted=0
and r.relationship_type_id=3
and r.is_deleted=0
and p2.party_type_id=2
and p2.is_deleted=0
and elc.id is null

Employer.name: Employer
rows: EmployerId is a unique ID field with an integer datatype. EmployerId is used to uniquly indentify each Employer in the Employer Table.
Party_id in employer table in 1.0 should be joined with id in party table to obtain the correct guid associated to the employer for the existing records. Any new records will have new GUID.
GUID is an acronym for 'Globally Unique Identifier'.  EmplouerGUID is used to uniquely identify each Employer record in the Employer Table.
EmployerName states the Employer worksite Name in the Employer Table. EmployerName allows the user to define the name of the employer.
join with employertype table to find the employertypeid

EmployerTypeId is used to identify what type an Employer belongs to. For e.g. Health Care or Higher Education etc. EmployerTypeId is a foreign Key in the Employer Table which referenes to the Employer Type Table.

In Connect1.0 there is no Parent Employer Id, This is a new column in 2.0. All the Employer Data should be migrated to 2.0 and ParentEmployerId will be NULL. In future if an Employer in 2.0 has a Parent Employer then an ID can be stored under ParentEmployerId.

ParentEmployerId field allows the user to establish a relationship between the employer they are creating and any other employers in the Connect2.0 database. ParentEmployerId acts a Foregin Key and references to the EmployerId in the Employer Table. For example,  Peace South is part of Kaiser Permanente, which makes Kaiser Parmanente the Parent Employer.
An Acronym is an abbreviation created for an Employer which states the first letter of each word from the Employer Name. For e.g. Fairfax County Public Schools will have an acronym as 'FCPS'

Select [EmployerId] = [EmployerId],
[EmployerGuid] = [EmployerGuid],
[EmployerName]  = [EmployerName],
[EmployerTypeId] = [EmployerTypeId],
[ParentEmployerId] = [ParentEmployerId],
[Acronym]  = [Acronym],
[EmployerCode] = [EmployerCode],
[ChapterId] = [ChapterId],
[HasPrivateSector] = [HasPrivateSector],
[Area] = [Area], 
[WebsiteURL] = [WebsiteURL],
[IsStructural] = 0,
[IsUnknown] = 0,
[CreatedAt] = CreatedAt,
[UpdatedAt] = UpdatedAt
From (
select distinct
[EmployerId] = p.id,
[EmployerGuid] = p.guid,
[EmployerName]  = e.name,
[EmployerTypeId] = isnull(e.employer_type_id,1),
[ParentEmployerId] = p.parent_party_id,
[Acronym]  = e.acronym,
[EmployerCode] = e.employer_code,
[ChapterId] = ISNULL(mf.Chapter_party_id, ISNULL(vwc1.ChapterId, vwc.ChapterId)),
[HasPrivateSector] = IIF(e.is_government = 0, 1, 0),
[Area] = e.area, 
[WebsiteURL] = e.website_url,
[IsStructural] = 0,
[IsUnknown] = 0,
a.party_id,
[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(p.created_at, p.updated_at),
[UpdatedAt] = isnull(p.updated_at, p.created_at)
from Employer e (nolock)
inner join party p  (nolock) on e.party_id=p.id
inner join relationship r  (nolock) on p.id = r.related_party_id
inner join [Affiliate] a  (nolock) on r.party_id = a.party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=a.number
Left Join migration_FederatedLocalMapping mf (nolock)	on mf.Employer_party_id = e.party_id
Left join Vw_1_Chapter vwc (nolock)	on vwc.ChapterId = a.party_id
Left Join Vw_1_Chapter vwc1 (nolock) on vwc1.ChapterId = 100000 + a.party_id
where 1=1
and p.is_deleted=0
and e.party_id is not null
and a.number is not null
and a.number not like 'cp%'
and a.number not in ('99799','99997','dc101')
and r.relationship_type_id=3
and r.is_deleted=0
and e.employer_type_id<>8
) a

Union


Select [EmployerId] = ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by EmployerId),
[EmployerGuid],
[EmployerName],
[EmployerTypeId],
[ParentEmployerId],
[Acronym],
[EmployerCode],
[ChapterId],
[HasPrivateSector],
[Area], 
[WebsiteURL],
[IsStructural],
[IsUnknown],
[CreatedAt] = GETDATE(),
[UpdatedAt] = GETDATE()
From
(
Select [EmployerId] = c.ChapterId,
[EmployerGuid] = NEWID(),
[EmployerName]  = CONCAT(Replace(Replace (c.ChapterName, ' - Structured Chapter', ''), ' - Unknown Chapter', ''), ' - Structured Employer'),
[EmployerTypeId] = 9,
[ParentEmployerId] = null,
[Acronym]  = null,
[EmployerCode] = NULL,
[ChapterId] = c.ChapterId,
[HasPrivateSector] = 0,
[Area] = NULL, 
[WebsiteURL] = NULL,
[IsStructural] = 1,
[IsUnknown] = 0
From Vw_1_Chapter c
Where IsStructural = 1

Union

Select [EmployerId] = 200000 + c.ChapterId,
[EmployerGuid] = NEWID(),
[EmployerName]  = CONCAT(Replace(Replace (c.ChapterName, ' - Unknown Chapter', ''), ' - Structured Chapter', ''), ' - Unknown Employer'),
[EmployerTypeId] = 9,
[ParentEmployerId] = null,
[Acronym]  = null,
[EmployerCode] = NULL,
[ChapterId] = c.ChapterId,
[HasPrivateSector] = 0,
[Area] = NULL, 
[WebsiteURL] = NULL,
[IsStructural] = 0,
[IsUnknown] = 1
From Vw_1_Chapter c
Join vw_1_Affiliate af	on c.AffiliateId = af.AffiliateId
Where (c.IsStructural = 1 and af.AffiliateNumber not in (Select number From vw_federated_local)) or
(c.IsStructural = 0 and af.AffiliateNumber in (Select number From vw_federated_local))
) a

rows: phonenumber is how we track the contact phone number of any entity

Select Distinct
[EmployerPhoneId] = c.id,
[EmployerId] = e.party_id,
[PhoneNumber] = ph.phone_number,
[Extension] = ph.extension,
[EmployerPhoneTypeId] =case when c.contact_context_id in (22,23,24) then c.contact_context_id else 22 end,
[ContactStatusId]= isnull(c.contact_status_id,2),
[CanTextRestrictionId] = IIF(isnull(ph.is_sms_allowed, 1) = 0, 2, 1),
[CanCallRestrictionId] = IIF(isnull(c.can_contact, 1) = 0, 2, 1),
[IsPreferred] = isnull(c.Is_Preferred,0),
[ContactSourceId] = c.contact_source_id,
[VerifiedDate] = c.verified_date,
[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(c.created_at, c.updated_at),
[UpdatedAt] = isnull(c.updated_at, c.created_at)
From Phone ph (nolock)
inner Join Contact c (nolock) on ph.contact_id = c.id
inner Join party p (nolock) on c.party_id = p.id
inner Join employer e (nolock) on e.party_id = p.id
inner Join relationship r (nolock) on r.related_party_id = e.party_id
inner Join affiliate af (nolock) on af.party_id = r.party_id
inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.id=af.party_id
inner Join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join vw_1_Employer ve (nolock) on ve.employerId=e.party_id
left join  employer_location_contact elc (nolock) on elc.contact_id=c.id
Where 1=1
and c.is_deleted = 0
and c.contact_type_id=1
and p.is_deleted = 0
and p.party_type_id = 3
and r.relationship_type_id = 3
and r.is_deleted=0
and p2.party_type_id=2
and p2.is_deleted=0
and ph.phone_number<>''
and elc.id is null

rows: The line 1 address of a location associated with an entity

SELECT DISTINCT
  [IndividualAddressId] = c.id,
  [IndividualId] = p.id,
  AddressLine1 = address_line_1,
  AddressLine2 = address_line_2,
  City = city,
  CountyId = county_id,
  StateTerritoryId = state_territory_id,
  CountryId = country_id,
  PostalCode = zip_code,
  CarrierRoute = carrier_route,
  Latitude = latitude,
  Longitude = longitude,
  [IndividualAddressTypeId] = CASE
   WHEN c.contact_context_id NOT IN (1, 2, 4, 5, 18) THEN 18
   ELSE c.contact_context_id
   END,
  [ContactStatusId] = c.contact_status_id,
  [IsPreferred] = c.is_preferred,
  [ContactSourceId] = c.contact_source_id,
  [VerifiedDate] = c.verified_date,
  [CanVisitRestrictionId] = IIF(ad.can_visit = 0, 2, 1),
  [CanSendMailRestrictionId] = IIF(c.can_contact = 0, 2, 1),
  [PreventNcoaUpdate] = ad.is_prevent_ncoa_update,
  [CreatedAt] = c.created_at,
  [UpdatedAt] = c.updated_at
FROM address ad (nolock)
INNER JOIN contact c (NOLOCK)  ON ad.contact_id = c.id
INNER JOIN party p (NOLOCK)  ON p.id = c.party_id
INNER JOIN individual i (NOLOCK)  ON i.party_id = p.id
INNER JOIN relationship r (NOLOCK)  ON r.party_id = i.party_id
INNER JOIN affiliate af (NOLOCK)  ON r.related_party_id = af.party_id
INNER JOIN vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (NOLOCK)  ON vw.affiliatenbr = af.number
inner join party p2 (nolock) on af.party_id=p2.id
WHERE c.is_deleted = 0
AND c.contact_type_id = 4
AND p.party_type_id = 1
AND r.relationship_type_id = 1
AND p.is_deleted = 0
AND r.is_deleted = 0
and p2.is_deleted=0
and i.last_name <> ''

IndividualAffiliate.name: IndividualAffiliate
rows: An Identification of an individual and an Affiliate's relationship
An Identification associated with an individual
An Identification  associated with  an Affiliate
Identification of the relationship between Affiliate and an Individual
An Identifiation of the membership dues payed from a member
Is active will help Identify if this individual currently affiliated with this Affiliate
The relationship between an individual and an Affiliate is Active or in active
The date associated with the deactivation of the individual's record or an end of the current affiliation type

Select [IndividualAffiliateId],
[IndividualId],
[AffiliateId],
[UnionRelationshipTypeId],
[ChapterId],
[LocalDuesCategoryId],
[HasLiabilityInsurance],
[HasAccidentInsurance],
[IsCurrent],
[IndividualDeactivationReasonId],
[StartDate],
[EndDate],
[PaidThroughDate],
[PaymentMethodId],
[PaymentFrequencyId],
[CreatedAt],
[UpdatedAt],
[chapter_Party_id]
From 
(
select distinct
[IndividualAffiliateId]=iar.relationship_id,
[IndividualId]=r.party_id,
[AffiliateId]=p.id,
[UnionRelationshipTypeId]=case
when iart.name in ('member','Potential Member','Agency Fee','Retired Member') then iart.id else 22 end,
[ChapterId]=case when vw.affiliatenbr in ('02222','06732') and iart.id != 23 and af.affiliate_type_id = 19 then r.related_party_id else null end,
[LocalDuesCategoryId]=mca.id,
[HasLiabilityInsurance]=iar.[has_occupation_liability_insurance],
[HasAccidentInsurance]=iar.[has_accident_insurance],
[IsCurrent]=case when iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_status_id=1 then 1 else 0 end,
[IndividualDeactivationReasonId]=case when iar.deactivation_reason_id = 6 then 4 else iar.deactivation_reason_id end,
[StartDate]=r.start_date,
[EndDate]=r.stop_date,
[PaidThroughDate]=iar.[paid_through_date],
[PaymentMethodId]=iar.[payment_method_id],
[PaymentFrequencyId]=iar.[payment_frequency_id],
[CreatedAt] = r.created_at,
[UpdatedAt] = isnull(r.updated_at, r.created_at),
[chapter_Party_id] = r.related_party_id
from relationship r (nolock)
inner join individual_affiliate_relationship iar (nolock) on r.id=iar.relationship_id
inner join affiliate af  (nolock) on af.party_id=r.related_party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw  (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join party p  (nolock) on p.guid=vw.affiliateid
inner join individual_affiliate_relationship_type iart (nolock) on iart.id=iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id
inner join individual i (nolock) on i.party_id=r.party_id
inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.id=i.party_id
inner join vw_1_individual vi (nolock) on vi.individualid=r.party_id
Left Join membership_category mc    (nolock) on mc.id = iar.membership_category_id
Left Join membership_category mca   (nolock) on mca.name = mc.name and mca.party_id = p.id and mca.is_deleted = 0 and mca.is_per_cap = 0
Left Join vw_1_LocalDuesCategory vw_ldc (nolock) on vw_ldc.AffiliateId = mca.party_id and mca.id = vw_ldc.LocalDuesCategoryId
where 1=1
and r.is_deleted=0
and iart.is_deleted=0
and p.is_deleted=0
and p2.is_deleted=0
and i.last_name<>''
) a
Where IsCurrent = 0

Union

Select 
[IndividualAffiliateId],
[IndividualId],
[AffiliateId],
[UnionRelationshipTypeId],
[ChapterId],
[LocalDuesCategoryId],
[HasLiabilityInsurance],
[HasAccidentInsurance],
[IsCurrent],
[IndividualDeactivationReasonId],
[StartDate],
[EndDate],
[PaidThroughDate],
[PaymentMethodId],
[PaymentFrequencyId],
[CreatedAt],
[UpdatedAt],
[chapter_Party_id]
From 
(
select distinct
[IndividualAffiliateId]=iar.relationship_id,
[IndividualId]=r.party_id,
[AffiliateId]=p.id,
[UnionRelationshipTypeId]=case
when iart.name in ('member','Potential Member','Agency Fee','Retired Member') then iart.id else 22 end,
[ChapterId]=case when vw.affiliatenbr in ('02222','06732') and iart.id != 23 and af.affiliate_type_id = 19 then r.related_party_id else null end,
[LocalDuesCategoryId]=mca.id,
[HasLiabilityInsurance]=iar.[has_occupation_liability_insurance],
[HasAccidentInsurance]=iar.[has_accident_insurance],
[IsCurrent]=case when iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_status_id=1 then 1 else 0 end,
[IndividualDeactivationReasonId]=case when iar.deactivation_reason_id = 6 then 4 else iar.deactivation_reason_id end,
[StartDate]=r.start_date,
[EndDate]=r.stop_date,
[PaidThroughDate]=iar.[paid_through_date],
[PaymentMethodId]=iar.[payment_method_id],
[PaymentFrequencyId]=iar.[payment_frequency_id],
ROW_NUMBER() Over (Partition by r.Party_id, p.id Order by r.Party_id, 
												Case When Case When iart.name in ('member','Potential Member','Agency Fee','Retired Member') then iart.id else 22 end != 22 Then 1 Else 2 End
												,r.Start_Date desc)r,
[CreatedAt] = r.created_at,
[UpdatedAt] = isnull(r.updated_at, r.created_at),
[chapter_Party_id] = r.related_party_id
from relationship r (nolock)
inner join individual_affiliate_relationship iar (nolock) on r.id=iar.relationship_id
inner join affiliate af  (nolock) on af.party_id=r.related_party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw  (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join party p  (nolock) on p.guid=vw.affiliateid
inner join individual_affiliate_relationship_type iart (nolock) on iart.id=iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id
inner join individual i (nolock) on i.party_id=r.party_id
inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.id=i.party_id
inner join vw_1_individual vi (nolock) on vi.individualid=r.party_id
Left Join membership_category mc    (nolock) on mc.id = iar.membership_category_id
Left Join membership_category mca   (nolock) on mca.name = mc.name and mca.party_id = p.id and mca.is_deleted = 0 and mca.is_per_cap = 0
Left Join vw_1_LocalDuesCategory vw_ldc (nolock) on vw_ldc.AffiliateId = mca.party_id and mca.id = vw_ldc.LocalDuesCategoryId
where 1=1
and r.is_deleted=0
and iart.is_deleted=0
and p.is_deleted=0
and p2.is_deleted=0
and i.last_name<>''
and iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_status_id=1
) a
Where (r = 1) or (r > 1 and UnionRelationshipTypeId != 22)

IndividualCopeId=a.individualcopeid,

AffiliateId=a.affiliateId,

CopePaymentFrequencyId=a.[CopePaymentFrequencyId],

from (
select

contribution_date,

row_number()Over (partition by r.party_id, p.id Order by iarcc.contribution_date desc) row_num
from individual_affiliate_relationship_cope_contribution iarcc (nolock)
inner join relationship r (nolock) on iarcc.relationship_id=r.id
inner join affiliate af (nolock) on r.related_party_id=af.party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenumber=af.number

inner join vw_1_affiliate va (nolock) on va.affiliateid=a.affiliateid
where a.row_num=1

Individual.name: Individual

An Individual's Previous Name. For e.g. If an Individual changed his/her name due to a life event/Marriage
a pronoun the person uses to identify themselves
the prefix an individual uses or prefers to be used
a link to the individuals image
GenderID which acts as a look up/link to Gender Table. GenderID is a foreign key which cross references the Gender table to obtain the valid data or an Individual's Gender. For E.g. Male or Female

MaritalStatusID which acts as a look up/link to MaritalStatus Table. MaritalStatusID is a foreign key which cross references the MaritalStatus table to obtain the valid data or an Individual's Marital Status. For e.g. Single or Married
the number of dependents under this person
Day of Birth field stores the day of birth of an Individual. Day will be recorded in dd format
Day of Birth field stores the month of birth of an Individual. Day will be recorded in mm format.
Day of Birth field stores the year of birth of an Individual. Day will be recorded in yyyy format.
Social Security number (last 4 digits used as external Id for locals with no external id)
an Id that isn't being generated from this database but instead come from the Affiliate or the Employer associated with this individual

        [EthnicityId] =e.Id,
        [MaritalStatusId] =m.Id,
        [Dependents] =i.number_of_dependents,
        [DayOfBirth] =i.birth_day,
        [MonthOfBirth] =i.birth_month,
        [YearOfBirth] =i.birth_year,
        [AffiliateAssignedId] =i.social_security_number,
        [IsPoliticallyActive] = i.is_politically_active,
        [IsRegisteredVoter] = i.is_registered_voter,
        [PoliticalPartyId] = i.political_party_id,
        [VoterPrecinct] = i.voter_precinct,
        [Township] = i.township,
        [Ward] = i.ward,
        [CongressionalDistrict] = i.congressional_district,
        [StateSenateDistrict] = i.state_senate_district,
        [StateHouseDistrict] = i.state_house_district,
        [ResidentialSchoolDistrict] = i.residential_school_district,
		[CreatedAt] = p.created_at,
		[UpdatedAt] = isnull(p.updated_at, p.created_at)
from individual i (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on i.party_id=p.id
inner join relationship r (nolock) on i.party_id=r.party_id
inner join affiliate af (nolock) on af.party_id=r.related_party_id
inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.id=r.related_party_id
INNER JOIN vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
left join prefix pre (nolock) on pre.id=i.prefix_id and pre.is_deleted=0
left join suffix suf (nolock) on suf.id=i.suffix_id and suf.is_deleted=0
left join gender g (nolock) on g.id=i.gender_id and g.is_deleted=0
left join Ethnicity e (nolock) on e.id=i.Ethnicity_id and e.is_deleted=0
left join Marital_Status m (nolock) on m.id=i.Marital_Status_id and m.is_deleted=0
where 1=1
and p.is_deleted=0
and r.is_deleted=0
and p.party_type_id=1
and p2.is_deleted=0
and p2.party_type_id=2
and i.last_name<>''

IndividualDeactivationReason.name: IndividualDeactivationReason
rows: an Id that will be able to identify and tie the reason behind a relationship being ended
the reason for the relationship being stopped

select distinct
[IndividualDeactivationReasonId]=id,
[IndividualDeactivationReasonName]=case
when name='Out of Unit' then 'Promoted Out of the Unit'
when name='Left Profession' then 'Quit Employment'
when name='Retired' then 'Member Retired'
when name='Quit Union - Eligible to Rejoin' then 'Quit Union (Eligible to Rejoin)'
else name end,
ApplicableToMember = case when name in ('Deceased', 'Erroneous Record', 'Retired',
'Not on file sent for upload','Out of Unit','Left Profession','Quit Union - Eligible to Rejoin','Unknown') then 1 else 0 end,
ApplicableToPotentialMember	= case when name in ('Deceased', 'Erroneous Record', 'Joined union','Not on file sent for upload',
'Out of Unit','Left Profession','Unknown') then 1 else 0 end,
ApplicableToAgencyFee	= case when name in ('Deceased', 'Erroneous Record', 'Joined union',
'Not on file sent for upload','Out of Unit','Left Profession','Unknown') then 1 else 0 end,
ApplicableToRetiree = case when name in ('Deceased', 'Erroneous Record', 'Unknown') then 1 else 0 end,
ApplicableToOther = case when name in ('Deceased', 'Erroneous Record', 'Joined union', 'Left Profession','Unknown') then 1 else 0 end,
[DisplayOrder]= case
when name = 'Deceased' then 1
when name = 'Erroneous Record' then 3
when name = 'Joined union' then 5
when name = 'Retired' then 6
when name = 'Joined union' then 5
when name = 'Not on file sent for upload' then 8
when name = 'Out of Unit' then 9
when name = 'Left Profession' then 10
when name = 'Quit Union - Eligible to Rejoin' then 11
when name = 'Unknown' then 15
end,
CreatedAt = ISNULL(created_at, updated_at),
UpdatedAt =  ISNULL(updated_at, created_at)
from deactivation_reason (nolock)
where id not in (6)
union
select [IndividualDeactivationReasonId]=11,[IndividualDeactivationReasonName]='Duplicate Record', 
ApplicableToMember = 1,
ApplicableToPotentialMember	= 1,
ApplicableToAgencyFee	= 1,
ApplicableToRetiree = 1,
ApplicableToOther = 1,
[DisplayOrder] = 2,
CreatedAt = null,
UpdatedAt = null
union
select [IndividualDeactivationReasonId]=14, [IndividualDeactivationReasonName]='Non Member Retired', 
ApplicableToMember = 0,
ApplicableToPotentialMember	= 1,
ApplicableToAgencyFee	= 1,
ApplicableToRetiree = 0,
ApplicableToOther =1,
[DisplayOrder] = 7,
CreatedAt = null,
UpdatedAt = null
union
select [IndividualDeactivationReasonId]=15, [IndividualDeactivationReasonName]='Establish New Relationship', 
ApplicableToMember = 0,
ApplicableToPotentialMember	= 0,
ApplicableToAgencyFee	= 0,
ApplicableToRetiree = 0,
ApplicableToOther = 0,
[DisplayOrder] = 4,
CreatedAt = null,
UpdatedAt = null
union
select [IndividualDeactivationReasonId]=16, [IndividualDeactivationReasonName]='Restore Previous Relationship', 
ApplicableToMember = 0,
ApplicableToPotentialMember	= 0,
ApplicableToAgencyFee	= 0,
ApplicableToRetiree = 0,
ApplicableToOther = 0,
[DisplayOrder] = 12,
CreatedAt = null,
UpdatedAt = null
union
select [IndividualDeactivationReasonId]=17, [IndividualDeactivationReasonName]='Took Job with Employer Union Represents', 
ApplicableToMember = 0,
ApplicableToPotentialMember	= 0, 
ApplicableToAgencyFee	= 0,
ApplicableToRetiree = 0,
ApplicableToOther = 1,
[DisplayOrder] = 14,
CreatedAt = null,
UpdatedAt = null
union
select [IndividualDeactivationReasonId]=18, [IndividualDeactivationReasonName]='Terminated by Employer', 
ApplicableToMember = 1,
ApplicableToPotentialMember	= 1, 
ApplicableToAgencyFee	= 1,
ApplicableToRetiree = 0,
ApplicableToOther = 1,
[DisplayOrder] = 13,
CreatedAt = null,
UpdatedAt = null

IndividualEmail.name: IndividualEmail
rows: An email address associated with an entity

SELECT DISTINCT
  [IndividualEmailId] = c.id,
  [IndividualId] = p.id,
  [Email] = em.email_address,
  [IndividualEmailTypeId] = CASE
                             WHEN c.contact_context_id NOT IN (1, 2, 14) THEN 14

                           END,
  [ContactStatusId] = c.contact_status_id,
  [IsPreferred] = c.is_preferred,
  [ContactSourceId] = c.contact_source_id,
  [VerifiedDate] = c.verified_date,
  [CanContactRestrictionId] = IIF(ISNULL(c.can_contact, 1) = 0 , 2, 1),
[CreatedAt] = c.created_at,
[UpdatedAt] = c.updated_at

INNER JOIN contact c (NOLOCK)  ON em.contact_id = c.id
  INNER JOIN party p (NOLOCK)  ON p.id = c.party_id 
  INNER JOIN individual i (NOLOCK)  ON i.party_id = p.id
INNER JOIN relationship r (NOLOCK)  ON r.party_id = i.party_id
INNER JOIN affiliate af (NOLOCK)  ON r.related_party_id = af.party_id
INNER JOIN vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (NOLOCK)  ON vw.affiliatenbr = af.number
inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.id=af.party_id

IndividualEmployer.name: IndividualEmployer
rows: A uniqiue Identification number used to identify the IndividualEmployer bridge table. IndividualEmployerId can be used to retrieve all the details of an Individual and his/her associated Employer.
An Identification number to identify an individual. IndividualId is a foreign key in IndividualEmployer Table which references IndividualId from the Individual Table
An Identification number to identify an Employer. EmployerId is a foreign key in IndividualEmployer Table which references EmployerId from the Employer Table
An Identification of an employee provided from an employer not an affiliate.

LocalJobClassId is an Identification Number used to identify an Individual's Job Class. LocalJobClassId is a foreign key in the Individual Employer Table which references to the LocalJobClass Table for all the details.
An Individual's Job Title with his/her associated Employer.
An Individual's Date that he/she got hired with an associated Employer
An Individual's Date that he/she got started working with an associated Employer
An Individual's Start date with a Bargaining Unit or a Union
An Individual's Last Day of Employement with his/her associated Employer
Is active will help Identify if an individual is currently Employed
The relationship between an individual and an Employer is Active or in active

Select [IndividualEmployerId],
[IndividualId],
[EmployerId],
[EmployeeId],
[LocalJobClassId] = IndEmp.[LocalJobClassId],
[JobTitleId] = jt.JobTitleId,
[JobDescription],
[HireDate],
[StartDate],
[UnitStartDate],
IndEmp.[UnitId],
[EndDate],
[WorkShift],
[RetirementEffDate],
[IsPartTime],
[IsTenured],
[CompensationId] = IndEmp.[CompensationId],
[PayPeriodTypeId],
[SubjectId],
[WorkLocationId],
[WorkStructureId],
[RoomNumber],
[Source],
[StopReason],
[IsCurrent],
CreatedAt,
UpdatedAt
From
(
select distinct
[IndividualEmployerId] = ier.relationship_id,
[IndividualId] = p.id,
[EmployerId] = e.party_id,
[EmployeeId] = trim(ier.employee_id),
[LocalJobClassId] = ISNULL(j.LocalJobClassId, ISNULL(j1.LocalJobClassId, ISNULL(j2.LocalJobClassId, j3.LocalJobClassId))),
[JobTitleId] = NULL,
[JobDescription] = ier.job_title,
[HireDate] = ier.hire_date,
[StartDate] = r.start_date,
[UnitStartDate] = null,
[UnitId] = ISNULL(u.UnitId, u1.UnitId),
[EndDate] = r.stop_date,
[WorkShift] = ier.work_shift,
[RetirementEffDate] = ier.retire_effectivity_date,
[IsPartTime] = ier.is_part_time,
[IsTenured] = ier.is_tenured,
[CompensationId] = null,
[PayPeriodTypeId] = ier.pay_period_type_id,
[SubjectId] = ier.subject_id,
[WorkLocationId] = vw_wl.WorkLocationId,
[WorkStructureId] = vw_ws.WorkStructureId,
[RoomNumber] = ier.room_number,
[Source] = ier.source,
[StopReason] = r.stop_reason,
[IsCurrent] = case when r.stop_date <= getdate() THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
CreatedAt = r.created_at,
UpdatedAt = isnull(r.updated_at, r.created_at)
from individual i (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on i.party_id=p.id
inner join relationship r (nolock) on p.id=r.party_id
left join employer e (nolock) on r.related_party_id = e.party_id
inner join individual_employer_relationship ier (nolock) on ier.relationship_id=r.id
inner join relationship r2 (nolock) on r2.party_id=p.id
inner join affiliate af (nolock) on af.party_id=r2.related_party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join vw_1_Employer ve (nolock) on ve.employerid=r.related_party_id
Inner Join vw_1_LocalAgreement  la (nolock)	on la.EmployerId = ve.EmployerId and la.IsUnknown = 1
Inner Join vw_1_Unit u1 (nolock)	on u1.LocalAgreementId = la.LocalAgreementId and u1.IsUnknown = 1	-- u1 To get UnKnown Unit If there is no real Unit
Left Join
(Select Distinct i.party_id Individual_Party_Id,
			af.party_id Chapter_Party_id,
			ROW_NUMBER() Over (Partition by IndividualId Order by Iar.Individual_affiliate_relationship_Status_id asc, r.Updated_At desc) rn
From Individual i
Join vw_1_Individual vwi (nolock)	on i.party_id = vwi.IndividualId
Join relationship r	(nolock)	on r.party_id = i.Party_id and r.relationship_type_id = 1 and r.is_deleted = 0
JOin Affiliate af (nolock)	on r.related_party_id = af.party_id and af.affiliate_type_id = 19
Join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
Join individual_affiliate_relationship iar (nolock)	on iar.relationship_id = r.id
) C
		On c.Individual_Party_Id = i.party_id and rn = 1	--To get real unit of an Individual
Left Join vw_1_Unit u	on u.Chapter_id = c.Chapter_Party_id and la.LocalAgreementId = u.LocalAgreementId	-- u To get real UnitID
left join vw_1_LocalJobClass j (nolock) on ier.job_class_id = j.Employer_job_class_id and u.UnitId = j.UnitId -- j Real Unit Real JobClass
Left Join vw_1_LocalJobClass j1 (nolock)	on j1.Employer_job_class_id = ier.job_class_id and u1.UnitId = j1.UnitId	-- j1 Unknown Unit Real JobClass
Left Join vw_1_LocalJobClass j2 (nolock)	on j2.UnitId = u.UnitId and j2.IsUnknown = 1 -- j2 Real Unit Unknown JobClass
Left Join vw_1_LocalJobClass j3 (nolock)	on u1.UnitId = j3.UnitId and j3.IsUnknown = 1	--j3 UnKnown Unit Unknown Job Class
left join subject sj (nolock) on ier.subject_id = sj.id
left join pay_period_type pt (nolock) on ier.pay_period_type_id = pt.id
left join employer_location el (nolock) on ier.employer_location_id = el.id and el.is_deleted=0
left join vw_1_WorkLocation vw_wl (nolock)	on vw_wl.WorkLocationId = el.id
left join employer_business_unit eb (nolock) on ier.employer_business_unit_id = eb.id and eb.is_deleted=0
left join vw_1_WorkStructure vw_ws (nolock)	on vw_ws.WorkStructureId = eb.id
where  1=1
and p.party_type_id=1
and p.is_deleted=0
and r.is_deleted=0
and r.relationship_type_id=2
and r2.relationship_type_id=1
and r2.is_deleted=0
and e.employer_type_id<>8
and i.last_name<>''
) IndEmp
Left Join vw_1_JobTitle jt (nolock)	on jt.LocalJobClassId = IndEmp.LocalJobClassId and jt.IsUnknown = 1

select distinct

[IndividualEmployerId] = ies.relationship_id,
[SessionId] = ies.session_id,
[ScheduleTypeId] = ies.schedule_type_id,
[ScheduleStartDate] = ies.start_date,
[ScheduleEndDate] = ies.end_date,
[DailyStartTime] = ies.start_time,
[DailyEndTime] = ies.end_time,
[CourseTitle] = ies.course_name,
[RoomNumber] = ier.room_number,
[Notes] = ies.notes,[Monday] = ies.monday,
[Tuesday] = ies.tuesday,
[Wednesday] = ies.wednesday,
[Thursday] = ies.thursday,
[Friday] = ies.friday,
[Saturday] = ies.saturday,
[Sunday] = ies.sunday
from individual_employer_relationship_schedule ies (nolock)
left join individual_employer_relationship ier (nolock) on ies.relationship_id = ier.relationship_id
join relationship r (nolock) on r.id=ier.relationship_id
inner join Party p (nolock)	on p.id = r.party_id
inner join vw_1_employer ve (nolock) on ve.employerid=r.related_party_id
Join relationship r2 (nolock) on r.related_party_id = r2.related_party_id and r2.relationship_type_id = 3
join affiliate af (nolock) on af.party_id=r2.party_id
join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
left join session s (nolock) on ies.session_id = s.id

where ies.is_deleted = 0

		and p.is_deleted = 0

IndividualPhone.name: IndividualPhone
rows: phonenumber is how we track the contact phone number of any entity
The phone number asscoiated with the the PhoneId

SELECT DISTINCT
  IndividualPhoneId = c.id,
  IndividualId = pa.id,
  PhoneNumber = p.phone_number,
  Extension = p.extension,              
  IndividualPhoneTypeId =
                         CASE
                           WHEN c.contact_context_id NOT IN (1, 2, 3, 11, 14, 16) THEN 14
                           ELSE c.contact_context_id
                         END,
  ContactStatusId = c.contact_status_id,
  CanTextRestrictionId = IIF(ISNULL(p.is_sms_allowed,1) = 0, 2, 1),
  CanCallRestrictionId = IIF(ISNULL(c.can_contact, 1) = 0, 2, 1),
  IsPreferred = c.is_preferred,
  ContactSourceId = c.contact_status_id,
  VerifiedDate = c.verified_date,
  CreatedAt = c.created_at,
  UpdatedAt = c.updated_at
FROM Phone p (NOLOCK)
INNER JOIN Contact c (NOLOCK)
  ON p.contact_id = c.id
INNER JOIN party pa (NOLOCK)
  ON c.party_id = pa.id
INNER JOIN individual i (NOLOCK)
  ON pa.id = i.party_id
INNER JOIN relationship r (NOLOCK)
  ON r.party_id = pa.id
INNER JOIN affiliate af (NOLOCK)
  ON r.related_party_id = af.party_id
JOIN vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (NOLOCK)
  ON vw.affiliatenbr = af.number
  inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.id=af.party_id
WHERE c.is_deleted = 0
AND pa.is_deleted = 0
AND pa.party_type_id = 1
AND r.relationship_type_id = 1
AND r.is_deleted = 0
and p2.is_deleted=0
and i.last_name<>''

LocalJobClass.name: LocalJobClass
rows: Records that have NULL has party_id is a National Job Class in the jobclass table in 1.0. That is the top 48 records. Any Records that have a party_id then it is a local job class in the jobclass table in 1.0

Records that have NULL has party_id is a National Job Class in the jobclass table in 1.0. That is the top 48 records. Any Records that have a party_id then it is a local job class in the jobclass table in 1.1

Records that have NULL has party_id is a National Job Class in the jobclass table in 1.0. That is the top 48 records. Any Records that have a party_id then it is a local job class in the jobclass table in 1.2

Select [LocalJobClassId] = ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by Employer_job_class_id),
Employer_job_class_id = Employer_job_class_id,
[LocalJobClassGuid],
[LocalJobClassName],
[NationalJobClassId],
[LocalJobClassCode],
[AffiliateId],
[UnitId],
[IsStructural] = 0,
[IsUnknown] = 0,
[CreatedAt],
[UpdatedAt]
From (
Select Distinct Employer_job_class_id = ejc.Id,
[LocalJobClassGuid] = ejc.guid,
[LocalJobClassName] = ejc.name,
[NationalJobClassId] = case 
when ejc.name like '%Teacher%' OR ejc.name like '%Substitute%' OR ejc.name like '%Science%' OR ejc.name like '%Kindergarden%' OR ejc.name like '%TCHR%' OR ejc.name like '%PRE K%' OR ejc.name like '%Grade 1%' OR ejc.name like '%Grade 2%' OR ejc.name like '%CTA%' then 28
when ejc.name like '%Elementary Specialist%' OR ejc.name like '%Secondary Specialist%' OR ejc.name like '%Teacher - Specialist%' OR ejc.name like '%Specialist%' then 29
when ejc.name like '%Admin%' OR ejc.name like '%Clerk%' OR ejc.name like '%Secretary%' OR ejc.name like '%Secretarial%' OR ejc.name like '%Professional Staff%' then 1
when ejc.name like '%Aide%' OR ejc.name like '%non-classroom%' OR ejc.name like '%Athletic%' OR ejc.name like '%Transportation%'then 2
when ejc.name like '%Engineer%' OR ejc.name like '%Scientist%' then 7 
when ejc.name like '%Building%' OR ejc.name like '%Grounds%' OR ejc.name like '%Maintenance%' OR ejc.name like '%Trades%' OR ejc.name like '%Storekeeper%' OR ejc.name like 'MECH' OR ejc.name like '%Technician%' OR ejc.name like '%Custodial%' OR ejc.name like '%Custodian%' then 3 
when ejc.name like '%Counselor%' OR ejc.name like '%Guidance Counselor%' then 4
when ejc.name like '%Driver%' OR ejc.name like '%Bus%'  then 5 
when ejc.name like '%Education Assistant/Paraprofessional%' OR ejc.name like '%PSRP%' OR ejc.name like '%Paraprofessional%' OR ejc.name like 'PARA' OR ejc.name like '%Paraeducator%' OR ejc.name like '%Education%' OR ejc.name like '%Assist%' OR ejc.name like '%SRP%' then 6 
when ejc.name like '%non tenure%' OR ejc.name like '%Lecturer%' then 8 
when ejc.name like '%adjunct%' OR ejc.name like '%Faculty - Adjunct%' OR ejc.name like 'Lecturer, Hrly'then 9 
when ejc.name like '%tenure-track%' OR ejc.name like '%tenure%' OR ejc.name like '%Faculty%'  OR ejc.name like '%Full-time tenure-track faculty%' then 10 
when ejc.name like '%Financial%' OR ejc.name like '%Accounting%' OR ejc.name like '%Accountant%' then 11
when ejc.name like '%Food%' OR ejc.name like '%Cafeteria%' OR ejc.name like '%Cook%' then 12
when ejc.name like '%Graduate%' then 13 
when ejc.name like '%Health%' OR ejc.name like '%Medical Professional%' OR ejc.name like '%Psychologist%' then 14
when ejc.name like '%Health Care Non-Professional%' OR ejc.name like '%Other Health Care%' then 15
when ejc.name like '%Science%' OR ejc.name like '%Technology%' OR ejc.name like '%Technologist%' OR ejc.name like '%Computer%' OR ejc.name like '%Programmer%' OR ejc.name like '%Data Quality%' OR ejc.name like '%Info Tech%'  OR ejc.name like 'IT' OR ejc.name like '%DATA BASE%' OR ejc.name like '%Database%'then 16
when ejc.name like '%Legal%' then 17
when ejc.name like '%Librarian%' OR ejc.name like '%Library%' OR ejc.name like '%Arcvst%' OR ejc.name like '%Corr Lbrn%'then 18
when ejc.name like '%Rehab%' then 19
when ejc.name like '%Licensed Nurse%' OR ejc.name like '%Licensed Practical Nurse%'  OR ejc.name like '%Nurse%' OR ejc.name like '%Clin Research Nurse%' OR ejc.name like '%HLTH NURSE%'then 20
when ejc.name like '%Registered Nurse%' OR ejc.name like 'RN' OR ejc.name like '%Nurse, Registered%' then 21
when ejc.name like '%School Nurse%' then 22
when ejc.name like '%Other Professional%' OR ejc.name like '%Therapist%' OR ejc.name like '%Therapeutic%' then 23
when ejc.name like '%Physician%' OR ejc.name like '%Doctor%' then 24
when ejc.name like '%Security%' OR ejc.name like '%Public Safety%' OR ejc.name like '%Crossing Guard %' then 25
when ejc.name like '%Public Employee%' OR ejc.name like '%Soc Wkr%' OR ejc.name like '%Social Worker%' OR ejc.name like '%Public Works%' OR ejc.name like '%Social Service%' then 26
when ejc.name like '%Supervisor%' then 27
else 23 end,
[LocalJobClassCode] = ejc.code,
[AffiliateId] = af.party_id,
[UnitId] = u.UnitId,
[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(ejc.created_at, ejc.updated_at),
[UpdatedAt] = ISNULL(ejc.updated_at, ejc.created_at)
From employer_job_class ejc (nolock)
Join employer e (nolock)	on ejc.party_id=e.party_id
Join relationship r (nolock)	on r.related_party_id = e.party_id and r.relationship_type_id = 3 and r.is_deleted = 0
Join affiliate af (nolock)	on r.party_id = af.party_id
Join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on af.number=vw.affiliatenbr
Join vw_1_Unit u	on e.party_id = u.EmployerId
Where ejc.is_deleted = 0 and ejc.party_id is not null
and u.IsStructural = 0 and u.UnitTypeId != 3
) a

Union

Select [LocalJobClassId] = 1000000 + ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by LocalJobClassId),
Employer_job_class_id = NULL,
[LocalJobClassGuid],
[LocalJobClassName],
[NationalJobClassId],
[LocalJobClassCode],
[AffiliateId],
[UnitId],
[IsStructural],
[IsUnknown],
[CreatedAt] = GETDATE(),
[UpdatedAt] = GETDATE()
From
(
Select Distinct [LocalJobClassId] = UnitId,
[LocalJobClassGuid] = newid(),
[LocalJobClassName] = LEFT(CONCAT(Replace (UnitName, ' - Structured Unit', ''), ' - Structured Local JobClass'), 200),
[NationalJobClassId] = null,
[LocalJobClassCode] = null,
[AffiliateId] = [AffiliateId],
[UnitId] = UnitId,
[IsStructural] = 1,
[IsUnknown] = 0
From vw_1_Unit
Where IsStructural = 1 or UnitTypeId = 3

Union

Select Distinct [LocalJobClassId] = UnitId,
[LocalJobClassGuid] = newid(),
[LocalJobClassName] = LEFT(CONCAT(Replace (UnitName, ' - Unknown Unit', ''), ' - Unknown Local JobClass'), 200),
[NationalJobClassId] = null,
[LocalJobClassCode] = null,
[AffiliateId] = [AffiliateId],
[UnitId] = UnitId,
[IsStructural] = 0,
[IsUnknown] = 1
From vw_1_Unit
Where IsStructural = 0 and UnitTypeId != 3
) b

MemberIdMapping.name: MemberIdMapping
rows: An Identification associated with an individual
An Identification  associated with  an Affiliate

Select [MemberIdMappingId] = ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by [MemberId]),
[IndividualId],
[AffiliateId],
[MemberId],
[CardMailDate],
[CardActivationDate],
[CardExpirationDate],
[CardActivationUser],
[CardIssue],
[CardComments],
[IsReplacementCardRequested],
[ReplacementCardRequestedDate],
[CreatedAt],
[UpdatedAt] 
From 
(select distinct
[IndividualId] = i.IndividualId,
[AffiliateId] = af.AffiliateId,
[MemberId]=iar.member_id,
[CardMailDate]=iar.card_mail_date,
[CardActivationDate]=iar.card_activation_date,
[CardExpirationDate]=iar.card_expiration_date,
[CardActivationUser]=iar.card_activation_user,
[CardIssue]=iar.card_issue,
[CardComments]=iar.[card_comments],
[IsReplacementCardRequested]=iar.[is_replacement_card_requested],
[ReplacementCardRequestedDate]=iar.[replacement_card_request_date],
[CreatedAt] = r.created_at,
[UpdatedAt] = isnull(r.updated_at, r.created_at),
ROW_NUMBER() Over (Partition by i.IndividualId, af.AffiliateId, iar.member_id Order by r.id desc) rn
from relationship r (nolock)
inner join individual_affiliate_relationship iar (nolock) on r.id=iar.relationship_id
inner join Affiliate a (nolock)	on a.party_id = r.related_party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate af (nolock) on a.number = af.AffiliateNumber
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw  (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.AffiliateNumber
inner join party p  (nolock) on p.guid=vw.affiliateid
inner join party p2 (nolock) on p2.id = r.party_id
inner join vw_1_individual i	(nolock) on p2.id = i.IndividualId
inner join individual_affiliate_relationship_type iart (nolock) on iart.id=iar.individual_affiliate_relationship_type_id
where iar.member_id<>''
and r.is_deleted=0
and p2.is_deleted = 0
and p.is_deleted=0
and iart.is_deleted=0
) a
Where rn = 1

NationalJobClass.name: NationalJobClass
rows: Records that have NULL has party_id is a National Job Class in the jobclass table in 1.0. That is the top 48 records. Any Records that have a party_id then it is a local job class in the jobclass table in 1.0

Records that have NULL has party_id is a National Job Class in the jobclass table in 1.0. That is the top 48 records. Any Records that have a party_id then it is a local job class in the jobclass table in 1.1

Records that have NULL has party_id is a National Job Class in the jobclass table in 1.0. That is the top 48 records. Any Records that have a party_id then it is a local job class in the jobclass table in 1.2

select distinct
NationalJobClassId = ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY a.NationalJobClassName),
NationalJobClassGuid = newid (),
a.*
From (Select distinct
NationalJobClassName = case when j.name in ('Technical/Administrative',  'Administrator/Supervisor', 'Secretary/Clerk', 'Clerical/Secretarial') then 'Administrative'
                            when j.name in ('Aide (playground, cafeteria, bus, other)', 'Early childhood edu assistant/aide/PSRP') then 'Aide, non-classroom'
							when j.name in ('Building/Grounds/Maintenance', 'Building/Grounds/Maintenance/Trades', 'Mechanics') then 'Building/Grounds/Maintenance/Trades'
							when j.name in ('Elementary Guidance Counselor', 'Secondary Guidance Counselor') then 'Counselor'
							when j.name in ('Bus Driver') then 'Driver'
							when j.name in ('Education Assistant/Paraprofessional', 'General PSRP') then 'Education Assistant/Paraprofessional'
							when j.name in ('Professional Staff') then 'Engineer/Scientist'
							when j.name in ('Full-time non tenure-track faculty') then 'Faculty - Full-time NTT'
							when j.name in ('Part-time/adjunct faculty') then 'Faculty - Part-time/Adjunct'
							when j.name in ('Full-time tenure-track faculty') then 'Faculty - Tenure Track'
							when j.name in ('Financial/Accounting Professional ') then 'Financial Professional '
							when j.name in ('Health', 'Medical Professional') then 'Health Care - Liscensed'
							when j.name in ('Health Care Non-Professional', 'Other Health Care Professional') then 'Health Care - Non-liscensed'
							when j.name in ('Science, Technology, Computer Services') then 'IT Professional'
							when j.name in ('Legal Professional/Law Enforcement/Corrections') then 'Legal Professional'
							when j.name in ('Librarian', 'Elementary Librarian', 'Secondary Librarian') then 'Librarian'
							when j.name in ('Social, Rehabilitative and Employment Services') then 'Mental Health Professional'
							when j.name in ('Licensed Practical Nurse') then 'Nurse, LPN'
							when j.name in ('Registered Nurse') then 'Nurse, RN'
							when j.name in ('Elementary School Nurse', 'Secondary School Nurse') then 'Nurse, School'
							when j.name in ('Security') then 'Public Safety/Security'
							when j.name in ('Public Employee') then 'Social Services'
							when j.name in ('Custodian') then 'Supervisor'
							when j.name in ('Early childhood education teacher', 'Elementary Teacher', 'Secondary Teacher', 'Teacher') then 'Teacher'
							when j.name in ('Elementary Specialist', 'Secondary Specialist') then 'Teacher - Specialist'
							when j.name in ('Therapist') then 'Other Professional' else j.name end,
NationalJobClassCode = null,
DivisionId = null
from job_class j (nolock)
inner join NationalJobClassName_NewList nl (nolock) on j.id = nl.NationalJobClassId
inner join division d (nolock) on j.division_id = d.id
where j.party_id is null
and national_job_class_id is null
and j.is_deleted = 0
and j.name not in ('Higher ED', 'Educational, Higher Ed., Cultural' )
) a

Unit.name: Unit
rows: UnitId is a unique Identification number used to Idenity each Unit in the Unit Table

select [UnitId]=ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by UnitId),
[UnitGuid],
[UnitName],
[UnitTypeId],
[EmployerId],
[LocalAgreementId],
[DivisionId],
[AffiliateId],
[IsStructural] = 0,
[IsUnknown] = 0,
[Chapter_id] = [Chapter_id],
[CreatedAt],
[UpdatedAt]
from (
Select Distinct [UnitId] = af.Party_id,
[UnitGuid]=p.guid,
[UnitName]=af.name,
[UnitTypeId]=6,
[EmployerId]=vwe.EmployerId,
[LocalAgreementId]=la.LocalAgreementId,
[DivisionId]=null,
[AffiliateId]=p.parent_party_id,
[Chapter_id] = af.party_id,
[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(p.created_at, p.updated_at),
[UpdatedAt] = ISNULL(p.updated_at, p.created_at)
from affiliate af (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on af.party_id = p.id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join vw_1_Affiliate vwaf (nolock)	on vwaf.AffiliateId = p.parent_party_id
inner join vw_1_Chapter vwc (nolock)	on vwaf.AffiliateId = vwc.AffiliateId
inner join vw_1_Employer vwe (nolock)	on vwe.ChapterId = vwc.ChapterId
inner join vw_1_LocalAgreement la (nolock)	on la.EmployerId = vwe.EmployerId 
where af.affiliate_type_id = 19
and p.is_deleted=0
and af.number<>''
and vwe.Isstructural = 0 
and vwc.IsStructural = 1
and af.number not in (Select number From vw_federated_local)
and la.IsStructural = 0 
and (af.name not like '% Ret' and af.name not like '%Reti%' and af.Name not like 'RET %' and af.Name not like 'RET')


Union

Select Distinct [UnitId] = af.Party_id,
[UnitGuid]=p.guid,
[UnitName]=af.name,
[UnitTypeId]=3,
[EmployerId]=vwe.EmployerId,
[LocalAgreementId]=la.LocalAgreementId,
[DivisionId]=null,
[AffiliateId]=p.parent_party_id,
[Chapter_id] = af.party_id,
[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(p.created_at, p.updated_at),
[UpdatedAt] = ISNULL(p.updated_at, p.created_at)
from affiliate af (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on af.party_id = p.id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join vw_1_Affiliate vwaf (nolock)	on vwaf.AffiliateId = p.parent_party_id
inner join vw_1_Chapter vwc (nolock)	on vwaf.AffiliateId = vwc.AffiliateId
inner join vw_1_Employer vwe (nolock)	on vwe.ChapterId = vwc.ChapterId and vwe.IsStructural = 1
inner join vw_1_LocalAgreement la (nolock)	on la.EmployerId = vwe.EmployerId and la.IsUnknown = 1 
where af.affiliate_type_id = 19
and p.is_deleted=0
and af.number<>''
and vwc.IsStructural = 1
--and af.number not in (Select number From vw_federated_local)
and la.IsStructural = 0 
and (af.name like '% Ret' or af.name like '%Reti%' or af.Name like 'RET %' or af.Name like 'RET')


Union


Select Distinct [UnitId] = ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by la.LocalAgreementId),
[UnitGuid]=NEWID(),
[UnitName]=CONCAT(Replace(Replace(la.LocalAgreementName, ' - Structured Local Agreement', ''), ' - Unknown Local Agreement', ''), ' - ', 'Retiree Unit'),
[UnitTypeId]=3,
[EmployerId]=vwe.EmployerId,
[LocalAgreementId]=la.LocalAgreementId,
[DivisionId]=null,
[AffiliateId]=vwc.AffiliateId,
[Chapter_id] = NULL,
[CreatedAt] = GETDATE(),
[UpdatedAt] = GETDATE()
From vw_1_LocalAgreement la (nolock)
Join vw_1_Employer vwe (nolock)	on la.EmployerId = vwe.EmployerId and vwe.IsStructural = 1 and la.IsUnknown = 1
JOin vw_1_Chapter vwc (nolock)	on vwc.ChapterId = vwe.ChapterId and vwc.IsStructural = 1
Where vwc.ChapterId not in 
(
Select Distinct vwc.ChapterId
from affiliate af (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on af.party_id = p.id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=af.number
inner join vw_1_Affiliate vwaf (nolock)	on vwaf.AffiliateId = p.parent_party_id
inner join vw_1_Chapter vwc (nolock)	on vwaf.AffiliateId = vwc.AffiliateId
inner join vw_1_Employer vwe (nolock)	on vwe.ChapterId = vwc.ChapterId and vwe.IsStructural = 1
inner join vw_1_LocalAgreement la (nolock)	on la.EmployerId = vwe.EmployerId and la.IsUnknown = 1 
where af.affiliate_type_id = 19
and p.is_deleted=0
and af.number<>''
--and af.number not in (Select number From vw_federated_local)
and la.IsStructural = 0 
and (af.name like '% Ret' or af.name like '%Reti%' or af.Name like 'RET %' or af.Name like 'RET')
)
) a

Union

Select [UnitId] = 100000 + ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by IsStructural, UnitId),
[UnitGuid],
[UnitName],
[UnitTypeId],
[EmployerId],
[LocalAgreementId],
[DivisionId],
[AffiliateId],
[IsStructural],
[IsUnknown],
Chapter_id = NULL,
[CreatedAt] = GETDATE(),
[UpdatedAt] = GETDATE()
From
(
Select Distinct
[UnitId] = vwe.EmployerId,
[UnitGuid] = NEWID(),
[UnitName] = CONCAT(Replace (la.LocalAgreementName, ' - Structured Local Agreement', ''), ' - Structured Unit'),
[UnitTypeId] = 6,
[EmployerId] = vwe.EmployerId,
[LocalAgreementId] = la.LocalAgreementId,
[DivisionId] = NULL,
[AffiliateId] = c.AffiliateId,
[IsStructural] = 1,
[IsUnknown] = 0
From vw_1_Employer vwe (nolock)
Join vw_1_Chapter c (nolock)	on vwe.ChapterId = c.ChapterId
Join vw_1_LocalAgreement la (nolock)	on vwe.EmployerId = la.EmployerId
Where la.IsStructural = 1


Union

Select Distinct
[UnitId] = vwe.EmployerId,
[UnitGuid] = NEWID(),
[UnitName] = CONCAT(Replace (la.LocalAgreementName, ' - Unknown Local Agreement', ''), ' - Unknown Unit'),
[UnitTypeId] = 6,
[EmployerId] = vwe.EmployerId,
[LocalAgreementId] = la.LocalAgreementId,
[DivisionId] = NULL,
[AffiliateId] = c.AffiliateId,
[IsStructural] = 0,
[IsUnknown] = 1
From vw_1_Employer vwe (nolock)
Join vw_1_Chapter c (nolock)	on	vwe.ChapterId = c.ChapterId
Join vw_1_LocalAgreement la (nolock)	on vwe.EmployerId = la.EmployerId
Where la.IsStructural = 0 and vwe.IsStructural = 0
) b

Select Distinct  [WorkLocationAddressId] = c.id,

WorkLocation.name: WorkLocation
rows: EmployerLocationId is a unique ID field with an integer datatype. EmployerLocationId is used to uniquly indentify each Employer's location in the EmployerLocation Table.
EmployerLocationName states an Employer's work location or work area name. This field stores is used to track an individual's specific work location.

select distinct
[WorkLocationId] = el.id,
[WorkLocationGuid] = el.guid,
[WorkLocationName] = el.name,
[WorkLocationTypeId]=case
when  el.employer_location_type_id=30 then 12
when  el.employer_location_type_id=29 then 11
when  el.employer_location_type_id=20 then 24
else  el.employer_location_type_id
end,
[ParentWorkLocationId] = el.parent_employer_location_id,
[WorkLocationCode] = el.number,
[WorkLocationArea] = el.area,
[IsPubliclyAccessible]  = el.is_public,
[NationalInstitutionTypeId] = case when el.institution_type_id in  (select NationalInstitutionTypeId from vw_1_NationalInstitutionType) then el.institution_type_id else null end,
[EmployerId] = el.party_id,
[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(el.created_at, el.updated_at),
[UpdatedAt] = ISNULL(el.updated_at, el.created_at)
from employer_location el (nolock)
inner join Employer e (nolock) on el.party_id = e.party_id
inner join [vw_1_employer] ev  (nolock) on ev.EmployerId=e.party_id
inner join party p   (nolock) on e.party_id=p.id
inner join relationship r  (nolock) on p.id = r.related_party_id
inner join Affiliate a  (nolock) on r.party_id = a.party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=a.number
where el.is_deleted = 0
and p.is_deleted=0
and r.is_deleted=0
and r.relationship_type_id=3
and (el.employer_location_type_id in (select worklocationtypeid from vw_1_worklocationtype)
or el.employer_location_type_id in (20,29,30))

[CanTextRestrictionId] = IIF(isnull(ph.is_sms_allowed,1) = 0, 2, 1),
[CanCallRestrictionId] = IIF(isnull(c.Can_Contact,1) = 0, 2, 1),
[IsPreferred] = isnull(c.Is_Preferred,0),
[ContactSourceId] = c.contact_source_id,

From Phone ph (nolock)
inner Join Contact c (nolock) on ph.contact_id = c.id

inner join vw_1_WorkLocation wl (nolock)	on wl.WorkLocationId = elc.employer_location_id

and elc.is_deleted = 0

WorkLocationPhoneType.name: WorkLocationPhoneType
rows:
Select distinct [WorkLocationPhoneTypeId] = cc.id,
[WorkLocationPhoneTypeName] = cc.name
From Contact_context cc (nolock)
Join contact_type_contact_context ctcc (nolock) on cc.id = ctcc.contact_context_id
Where party_type_id = 3
and ctcc.contact_type_id = 1
and cc.is_deleted = 0
and ctcc.is_deleted = 0

WorkLocationStructure.name: WorkLocationStructure
rows:
Select distinct
[WorkLocationStructureId] = eleb.id,
[WorkLocationId] = eleb.employer_location_id,
[WorkStructureId] = eleb.employer_business_unit_id
from employer_location_employer_business_unit_relationship eleb (nolock)
inner join vw_1_worklocation wl (nolock) on wl.worklocationid=eleb.employer_location_id
inner join vw_1_workstructure ws (nolock) on ws.workstructureid=eleb.employer_business_unit_id
where eleb.is_deleted = 0

WorkLocationType.name: WorkLocationType
rows:
select distinct
[WorkLocationTypeId]=id,
[WorkLocationTypeName]=name,
[EmployerTypeId]=employer_type_id,
[HierachicalOrder]=ordinal
from employer_location_type
where is_deleted=0
and employer_type_id not in (7,8)
and id not in (19, 20,21)

WorkStructure.name: WorkStructure
rows: join with Employee table to find the EmployeeID
All the Work Structure Data should be migrated first and ParentWorkStructureId will be NULL. Once the data is loaded onto the  Work Structure Table then Update the relevant ParentWorkStructureId.

select distinct
[WorkStructureId] = eb.id,
[WorkStructureGuid] = eb.guid,
[WorkStructureName] = eb.name,
[EmployerId] = e.party_id,
[WorkStructureTypeId] = eb.employer_business_unit_type_id,
[ParentWorkStructureId] = eb.parent_employer_business_unit_id,
[WorkStructureCode] = eb.work_unit_code,
[CreatedAt] = ISNULL(eb.created_at, eb.updated_at),
[UpdatedAt] = ISNULL(eb.updated_at, eb.created_at)
from employer_business_unit eb (nolock)
inner join party p (nolock) on eb.party_id = p.id
inner join employer e (nolock) on p.id = e.party_id
inner join [vw_1_employer] ev  (nolock) on ev.EmployerId=e.party_id
inner join relationship r  (nolock) on p.id = r.related_party_id
inner join [Affiliate] a  (nolock) on r.party_id = a.party_id
inner join vw_1_affiliate_connect vw (nolock) on vw.affiliatenbr=a.number
inner join vw_1_workstructuretype vwst (nolock) on vwst.workstructuretypeid=eb.employer_business_unit_type_id
where 1=1
and eb.is_deleted=0
and p.is_deleted=0
and r.relationship_type_id=3
and r.is_deleted=0

WorkStructureType.name: WorkStructureType
rows:
select distinct
[WorkStructureTypeId]=id,
[WorkStructureTypeName]=case when name='Unit' then 'Work Unit' else name end,
[EmployerTypeId]=employer_type_id,
[HierachicalOrder]=ordinal
from employer_business_unit_type
where is_deleted=0
and employer_type_id not in (7,8)
and name not in ('Work Area','Worksite')
